title: Spirit Speaker (Specialty)
content:
Spirit Speaker is one of the available specialty sets for Ranger decks.

Spirit Speakers are gifted counselors and sages, adept at communing with the world of the unseen. Spirit Speaker cards revolve around playing and interacting with spirit beings; calling upon their aid and following their guidance to affect the game state and further the Rangers’ goals.

Life as a Spirit Speaker

All Spirit Speakers are born with the ability to commune with the spirit beings who dwell beyond the physical world. As such, in a similar fashion to an Elder, one might consult their village’s spirit speaker about matters of great import or when the way forward may be unclear. Spirit Speakers who join the Rangers are prized as patrol mates, for their helping spirits often prove to be the difference in a given mission’s success.
